original: nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje dpa' bo chen po rlabs kyi 'phreng ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge🔽'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra sgrog pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i

translated: the samadhi called “great vajra hero wave garland,”🔽the samadhi called “vajra sound of all tathagatas,”

translated: the samadhi called “vajra light of the wisdom of the commitment of all tathagatas,”🔽the samadhi called “enjoyment of the vajra accomplishment of all tathagatas’ hopes,”🔽the samadhi called “glory of the victory banner of the seal of the commitment of Vajrasattva that pleases,”

original: phyag rgya mnyes par byed pa'i rgyal mtshhan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
analyzed: phyag rgya mnyes par byed pa'i rgyal mtshhan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod pa lnga la nye bar longs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
translated: the samadhi called “enjoyment of the five desires of all tathagatas,”

analyzed: 'dzin dang /_gnod sbyin mo thams cad kyi dam tshhig gnas pa'i bsgom pa rdo rje
translated: and the samadhi called “vajra meditation of the commitment of all yakshinis.”

original: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sngags thams cad kyi
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sngags thams cad kyi
translated: The samadhi called “The Tathagata’s vajra of all mantras”🔽

original: sprul pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te bcu gnyis pa'o/_/🔽le'u bcu bdun pa la/_khams gsum thams cad kyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro🔽ma'i dam tshhig mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa🔽thams cad mnyam par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje 'dzin thams🔽cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshhig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
analyzed: sprul pa 'byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te bcu gnyis pa'o/_/ le'u bcu bdun pa la/_khams gsum thams cad kyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshhig mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi dam tshhig la dmigs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
translated: The twelfth is the samadhi called “vajra source of emanations of all tathagata vajra mantras.”

original: dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhes bya🔽ba'i ting nge 'dzin te bzhi pa'o/_/de ltar le'u bcu bdun pa'i ting nge 'dzin du
analyzed: dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te bzhi pa'o/_/de ltar le'u bcu bdun pa'i ting nge 'dzin du
translated: In the seventeenth chapter, there is the samadhi called “vajra pledge of equality of all dakinis of the three realms,” the samadhi called “entry into the equality of all tathagatas,” the samadhi called “vajra focus on the pledge of the siddhis of all vajra holders,” and the fourth, the samadhi called “enjoyment of the desires of all tathagatas.”🔽Thus, these should be understood as the samadhis of the seventeenth chapter.

original: shes par bya'o/_/ le'u bco brgyad pa la ni/_ting nge 'dzin ma smos so//_//
analyzed: shes par bya'o/_/ le'u bco brgyad pa la ni/_ting nge 'dzin ma smos so//_//
translated: In the eighteenth chapter, samadhi is not mentioned.

original: gzhan yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_lha'i rigs
analyzed: gzhan yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang /_lha'i rigs
translated: Furthermore, what are the maṇḍalas and the families of the glorious Guhyasamāja?

original: bye brag tu phye ba gang zhe na/_dkyil 'khor gsum dang rigs lnga'o/_/dkyil
analyzed: bye brag tu phye ba gang zhe na/_dkyil 'khor gsum dang rigs lnga'o/_/dkyil
translated: What are the distinctions? There are three maṇḍalas and five families.🔽What are the three maṇḍalas? There are the maṇḍala of mind, the maṇḍala of body, and the maṇṇḍala of speech.

original: 'khor gsum gang zhe na/_thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang sku'i dkyil 'khor dang / gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro/_/mdor na sgrub pa po'i yi dam gyi lha gang yin pa
analyzed: 'khor gsum gang zhe na/_thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang sku'i dkyil 'khor dang / gsung gi dkyil 'khor ro/_/mdor na sgrub pa po'i yi dam gyi lha gang yin pa
translated: In brief, it does not matter which deity is the pledge deity of the practitioner.

original: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa
analyzed: rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gsang ba 'dus pa'i rgya cher 'grel pa
translated: The Great Commentary on the Glorious Guhyasamāja, the King of Tantras

original: gtsho bo dang gtsho mo/_sems dpa' dang sems ma/_khro bo dang khro mo/
analyzed: gtsho bo dang gtsho mo/_sems dpa' dang sems ma/_khro bo dang khro mo/
translated: male and female, male and female bodhisattvas, male and female wrathful ones,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtsho bo gang gis byas kyang mi 'gal te/_de yang yi🔽dam gyi lha thugs kyi rigs su bsgoms na/_thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya/
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtsho bo gang gis byas kyang mi 'gal te/_de yang yi dam gyi lha thugs kyi rigs su bsgoms na/_thugs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya/
translated: and so forth. It does not matter which male is in the center of the maṇḍala,🔽because if one meditates on the pledge deity as the family of mind, it is called the maṇḍala of mind.

original: yi dam gyi lha sku'i rigs su bsgoms na/_sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya/_yi dam
analyzed: yi dam gyi lha sku'i rigs su bsgoms na/_sku'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya/_yi dam
translated: If one meditates on the pledge deity as the family of body, it is called the maṇḍala of body.

original: gyi lha gsung gi rigs su bsgoms na/_gsung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/_/
analyzed: gyi lha gsung gi rigs su bsgoms na/_gsung gi dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o/_/
translated: If one meditates on the deities of the speech family, it is called the mandala of speech.
